Articles.Content: Do you have any suggestions for add-ons to make KSP look more beautiful? And by add-ons I mean not just high-res textures, but things that add new visual effects to the game. Examples (and the ones I'm using) are Distant Object Enhancement, Ambient Light Adjustment, Planetshine, and the obligatory Environmental Visual Enhancement.
Texture replacer and some new textures to plug into it.
Chatterer gets mentioned a lot. It can really improve the atmosphere of the game.

Chatterer gets mentioned a lot. It can really improve the atmosphere of the game.

Would you say that it makes a Better Atmosphere?
Better Atmospheres goes good with those, plus Renaissance is good, as well as Hot Rockets, Cool Rockets, and SmokeScreen
You can try: BlueHarvest ENB Series and BlueHarvest ENB +SweetFX or SweetFX Baleur but they haven't been update since many months.
